About.heading: Who are we?
About.description: At OMGG (One More Good Game) we are looking to reinvent board games in the digital age.
About.text: Our mission is to offer players and creators a new way to imagine, play and share unique experiences, combining the creativity of board games with the codes of video games.

card1.text: You're an independent designer or a publisher with a game to digitise, an idea to prototype or a companion application to add? Submit your project to us, and together we'll bring your ideas to life!

card2.text: We create immersive experiences while preserving the soul of the games we adapt or prototype. Each project is designed to preserve the game's unique identity, while at the same time enriching it.

Blog.heading: Actuality and last releases
Blog.description: Keep up to date with the latest news on our blog. Follow our progress, discover industry trends and explore our thoughts on publishing, development, technology and market opportunities. We'll share it all with you!

about.heading: About Vermines
about.description: In the city of bees, where various species of insects live in harmony, strange characters intrude upon the royal court. They are representatives of various ancient cults, each attempting to invoke their demonic god. To do so, they need to sacrifice souls, and the more noble the victim, the more valuable their soul. Which of these characters will be the first to gather the number of souls needed to allow their god to wreak havoc on the kingdom?
